sqlMap.select: select a.menu_id "id", menu_pid "pid", menu_name "text", b.menu_id "id2", c.menu_id "id3" from sc_menu a left join (select distinct (m.menu_id) from sc_menu m, role_user_rela a, role_menu_rela b where a.role_id = b.role_id and b.menu_id = m.menu_id and a.user_id = #userId#) b on a.menu_id = b.menu_id left join (select r.menu_id from user_menu_rela r where r.user_id = #userId#) c on a.menu_id = c.menu_id order by a.menu_order, a.menu_id

select a.id "id", a.name "name", a.pid "pid", a.tp "tp", a.ord "ord", b.r_view "view", b.r_print "print", b.export "export", c.r_view "view2", c.r_print "print2", c.export "export2" from ( select id, name, pid, 'cata' tp, ord,
now()
sysdate

crtdate from report_catalog where type = -1 union all select rid+100000 id, name, cata_id pid, 'report' tp, 1 ord, crt_date crtdate from olap_user_release ) a left join ( select r.r_view,r.r_print,r.export,r.report_id from role_report_rela r, role_user_rela u where r.role_id =u.role_id and u.user_id = #userId# ) b on a.id - 100000 = b.report_id left join ( select r.r_view, r.r_print, r.export, r.report_id from user_report_rela r where r.user_id = #userId# ) c on a.id - 100000 = c.report_id order by tp, ord, a.crtdate desc, id
